content:
From: Lukas Bulwahn <bulwahn@in.tum.de>
Hi,

motivated by Brian's announcement about their sourceforge project, I
added another wikipage

https://isabelle.in.tum.de/community/Other_Work_in_Progress

to announce other (student) projects I am involved in---mainly to
document their existence.
You are welcome to add your (student) projects as well.

Lukas
